text: Armando Francioli (October 21, 1919 – April 6, 2020) was an Italian actor."Italian brothers and actors Armando, Germana and Luciano Francioli visiting the excavations in Ostia Antica. Ostia Antica, June 1962" He appeared in more than fifty movies, beginning in 1942. Francioli was born in Rome. His best known roles were in The Pharaohs' Woman, The Opium Den and in Hawk of the Caribbean. Francioli died in Rome on April 6, 2020 at the age of 100.IL NECROLOGIO DEI GIUSTIE' morto Francioli, con il suo spot lanciò su Carosello l'industria aretina e la Fiera ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian centenarians Category:Actors from Rome
title: Armando Francioli
